alert.note: Alert for Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 12 at 10:52PM CST until December 12 at 11:45PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN LIPSCOMB...WHEELER AND HEMPHILL COUNTIES... At 1051 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Arnett to 5 miles northeast of New Mobeetie, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Canadian, Briscoe, Wheeler, Higgins, New Mobeetie, Allison, Glazier, Lake Marvin, Kellerville and Mobeetie. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CST for the Panhandle of Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
